TopicTitle: Stage light stuck on purple, can't launch anything with space.

Articles.Content:
I have just started with KSP today. Tutorials went just fine without any problems. Now I'm trying to build my own spacecraft and the stage light is stuck on purple. Pressing space does nothing. I have tried:

  • Pressing Alt+L.
  • Alternating max throttle---> no throttle.
  • Restarting, reinstalling, making the simplest ship possible,etc.

Here is a screenshot

I CAN activate all the components manually (as the screenshot shows) but that's no use when I have four boosters as the spacecraft is pointing down by the time I manage to activate all the boosters.

Kerbal Space Program - 0.25.0.642 (WindowsPlayer)

Could you please see [thread=92230]this thread[/thread] and upload a log file for us to look at?

Could you please see [thread=92230]this thread[/thread] and upload a log file for us to look at?

Double post

Edited November 29, 2014 by thegodofbigthings

There is no attachment option and forum posts have a 1000 word limit, so your log is cut off.

The post that vexx32 linked to has some suggestions for where to upload your log.
Press alt+F12, click the "Show input lock stack" button, what does it say?
It looks like you could use the number keys to do it. And it appears that you have rss so this should be in modded.

I don't know what this was, but thank god it solved itself.

Thanks for your help everyone.
